title: Beyhadh Spoiler: Maya-Arjun’s Grand Wedding - New Entry To Bring Twist In Arjun & Maya’s Lives!
text:
» Beyhadh Spoiler: Maya-Arjun’s Grand Wedding - New Entry To Bring Twist In Arjun & Maya’s Lives! Beyhadh Spoiler: Maya-Arjun’s Grand Wedding - New Entry To Bring Twist In Arjun & Maya’s Lives! In Beyhadh, the viewers will witness a major drama during Maya and Arjun’s wedding. A new entry will bring new twists in Arjun & Maya’s lives.   18:57   
The makers of Beyhadh are leaving no stones unturned to bring a lot of twists to keep the audiences engaged. Finally, the day of Maya and Arjun's marriage has arrived. The viewers will witness a lot of twists during the wedding as there are so many things that are happening around to stop the wedding.Will the Arjun and Maya get married? Read on to know more... Maya 
The promo shows Maya says that she is trying to forget the past and wishing that he past do not interfere in her life as she is going to start her life afresh by getting married to Arjun. Maya Takes Lord's Blessing 
She thanks the Lord Ganesha for giving her whatever she wanted and takes the blessing. But, Ashwin's dead body falls on the 'hawan kund' by spilling blood on Maya's face! Vandana Stops Arjun-Maya's Marriage 
As we reported earlier, Ashwin tries to stop Maya's wedding. He even gets successful in doing so as he reveals the truth to Arjun's mother Vandana. Maya Wants Ashwin Dead! 
Both Maya and Jhanvi are angry at Ashwin and want to kill him. While a few spoilers suggest Maya killed Ashwin, a few others claim that Saanjh murdered him and the blame comes on Maya. Ashwin's Murder 
A new entry will bring a lot of twist on the show. Apparently, Ajay Arya has been roped in to play the role of a cop. He will be investigating Ashwin's murder case. Ajay Arya As A Cop 
Ajay was quoted by an entertainment portal as saying, "I am a fan of Beyhadh and I am glad to be part of it now. My character is very interesting and it will add drama in the wedding sequence of Arjun and Maya." Arjun & Maya Face Issues 
Also there are reports that post marriage, Arjun and Maya will face problems. Arjun will get to know about Maya's obsession. Post Marriage Twist 
Post marriage, Maya will stop Arjun from staying at his own house. She wants Arjun to stay at Maya's place post marriage. Surprisingly, this will be against Arjun's wish! Saanjh 
There are also reports that after getting to know about Maya's truth, Saanjh will be seen supporting Arjun. What will Maya do now? Stay locked to get the latest updates... The makers of Beyhadh are leaving no stones unturned to bring a lot of twists to keep the audiences engaged. Finally, the day of Maya and Arjun’s marriage has arrived. The viewers will witness a lot of twists during the wedding as there are so many things that are happening around to stop the wedding. Will the Arjun and Maya get married? Read on to know more… Story So Far… In the previous episode, we saw how Vandana gets to know about Maya’s medical condition. Ashwin reveals how crazy Maya was as she tried to hurt Ashwin during her childhood days. He also reveals a few other secrets to Vandana, which makes her rush to the mantap to stop the marriage. It has to be recalled that Vandana didn’t want the marriage to happen as she gets to know from the pandit that the couple is not compatible. She also gets to know that Arjun’s life will be in danger because of Maya. Vandana would have even asked Saanjh to stop the marriage, but the latter convinces her that Maya and Arjun are good together. When Vandana takes Arjun away from Maya from mantap, Maya goes crazy and she locks herself in the room. Arjun also is upset that his mother trusted Ashwin, who has been torturing Maya since a long time. Maya’s mother Jhanvi also goes to Ashwin’s apartment to kill Ashwin for trying to stop Maya and Arjun’s marriage. But, Ashwin gets to know about Jhanvi’s motive and stops her.
